<h1 align="center">
  Personal Blog
</h1>

This is my personal blog where I write about web development. 
I created this as a way to sharpen my Gatsby and React skills but primarily as a platform where I could write about the things I'm interested in. 

### Features

* Algolia Search feature
* PWA - Progressive Wev App
* Responsive Design
* Pagination

### Technologies

* Gatsby
* React.js
* Styled-Components 
* Hosted & Deployed using Netlify
* npm
